description:
A Dance Stone mishap leads to the whole team switching bodies! The classmates are in a panic trying to get Hibiki and Maito to switch back, but while inside Maito`s body, Hibiki witnesses a curious sight...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I Saw It! Maito`s Heart Is a Mystery!
Ore wa Mita! Maito no Kokoro wa Mystery
俺は見た! 舞人の心はミステリー
